title: Scorn
description: REPENT... AND BEG FOR MERCY.The new Messiah sits on the throne of St. Peter's. Across the world, the faithful rise up to reclaim God's kingdom with blood and fire. The heathen hordes are exterminated without mercy, while the flames of Hell laugh with wicked delight...Yet there are those who would stand against this new terror, no matter the cost. And they will endure scorn and persecution that will test their bodies and spirits to the breaking point.The world cries out for God, and when He answers, all shall listen. And all shall be judged...
author: Mark Carver
